57 namespace reactphysics3d {
58 
59 // Declarations
60 class Island;

63 struct JointInfo;
64 
65 // Class PhysicsWorld
69 class PhysicsWorld {
70 
71  public:
72 
74 
77  struct WorldSettings {
78 
80  std::string worldName;
81 
83  Vector3 gravity;
84 
86  decimal persistentContactDistanceThreshold;
87 
89  decimal defaultFrictionCoefficient;
90 
92  decimal defaultBounciness;
93 
95  decimal restitutionVelocityThreshold;
96 
98  bool isSleepingEnabled;
99 
101  uint16 defaultVelocitySolverNbIterations;
102 
104  uint16 defaultPositionSolverNbIterations;
105 
107  float defaultTimeBeforeSleep;
108 
111  decimal defaultSleepLinearVelocity;
112 
115  decimal defaultSleepAngularVelocity;
116 
120  decimal cosAngleSimilarContactManifold;
121 
122  WorldSettings() {
123 
124  worldName = "";
125  gravity = Vector3(0, decimal(-9.81), 0);
126  persistentContactDistanceThreshold = decimal(0.03);
127  defaultFrictionCoefficient = decimal(0.3);
128  defaultBounciness = decimal(0.5);
129  restitutionVelocityThreshold = decimal(0.5);
130  isSleepingEnabled = true;
131  defaultVelocitySolverNbIterations = 6;
132  defaultPositionSolverNbIterations = 3;
133  defaultTimeBeforeSleep = 1.0f;
134  defaultSleepLinearVelocity = decimal(0.02);
135  defaultSleepAngularVelocity = decimal(3.0) * (PI_RP3D / decimal(180.0));
136  cosAngleSimilarContactManifold = decimal(0.95);
137  }
138 
139  ~WorldSettings() = default;
140 
142  std::string to_string() const {
143 
144  std::stringstream ss;
145 
146  ss << "worldName=" << worldName << std::endl;
147  ss << "gravity=" << gravity.to_string() << std::endl;
148  ss << "persistentContactDistanceThreshold=" << persistentContactDistanceThreshold << std::endl;
149  ss << "defaultFrictionCoefficient=" << defaultFrictionCoefficient << std::endl;
150  ss << "defaultBounciness=" << defaultBounciness << std::endl;
151  ss << "restitutionVelocityThreshold=" << restitutionVelocityThreshold << std::endl;
152  ss << "isSleepingEnabled=" << isSleepingEnabled << std::endl;
153  ss << "defaultVelocitySolverNbIterations=" << defaultVelocitySolverNbIterations << std::endl;
154  ss << "defaultPositionSolverNbIterations=" << defaultPositionSolverNbIterations << std::endl;
155  ss << "defaultTimeBeforeSleep=" << defaultTimeBeforeSleep << std::endl;
156  ss << "defaultSleepLinearVelocity=" << defaultSleepLinearVelocity << std::endl;
157  ss << "defaultSleepAngularVelocity=" << defaultSleepAngularVelocity << std::endl;
158  ss << "cosAngleSimilarContactManifold=" << cosAngleSimilarContactManifold << std::endl;
159 
160  return ss.str();
161  }
162  };
163 
164  protected :
165

167 
169  MemoryManager& mMemoryManager;

172  WorldSettings mConfig;
173 
175  EntityManager mEntityManager;
176

182

185 
187  RigidBodyComponents mRigidBodyComponents;
188

193  ColliderComponents mCollidersComponents;
194 
196  JointComponents mJointsComponents;
197

200

203

206

215

229  static uint32 mNbWorlds;

462 
463  // -------------------- Friendship -------------------- //
464 
465  friend class CollisionDetectionSystem;
466  friend class CollisionBody;
467  friend class Collider;
468  friend class ConvexMeshShape;
469  friend class CollisionCallback::ContactPair;
470  friend class OverlapCallback::OverlapPair;
471  friend class PhysicsCommon;
472  friend class RigidBody;
473  friend class Joint;
474  friend class BallAndSocketJoint;
475  friend class FixedJoint;
476  friend class HingeJoint;
477  friend class SliderJoint;
478  friend class CollisionCallback::CallbackData;
479  friend class OverlapCallback::CallbackData;
480  friend class DebugRenderer;
481 };
482 
483 // Set the collision dispatch configuration
486 
490 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE CollisionDispatch& PhysicsWorld::getCollisionDispatch() {
491  return mCollisionDetection.getCollisionDispatch();
492 }
493 
494 // Ray cast method
501 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void PhysicsWorld::raycast(const Ray& ray,
502  RaycastCallback* raycastCallback,
503  unsigned short raycastWithCategoryMaskBits) const {
504  mCollisionDetection.raycast(raycastCallback, ray, raycastWithCategoryMaskBits);
505 }
506 
507 // Test collision and report contacts between two bodies.
512 
517 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void PhysicsWorld::testCollision(CollisionBody* body1, CollisionBody* body2, CollisionCallback& callback) {
518  mCollisionDetection.testCollision(body1, body2, callback);
519 }
520 
521 // Test collision and report all the contacts involving the body in parameter
526 
530 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void PhysicsWorld::testCollision(CollisionBody* body, CollisionCallback& callback) {
531  mCollisionDetection.testCollision(body, callback);
532 }
533 
534 // Test collision and report contacts between each colliding bodies in the world
539 
542 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void PhysicsWorld::testCollision(CollisionCallback& callback) {
543  mCollisionDetection.testCollision(callback);
544 }
545 
546 // Report all the bodies that overlap (collide) with the body in parameter
550 
554 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void PhysicsWorld::testOverlap(CollisionBody* body, OverlapCallback& overlapCallback) {
555  mCollisionDetection.testOverlap(body, overlapCallback);
556 }
557 
558 // Report all the bodies that overlap (collide) in the world
562 
565 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void PhysicsWorld::testOverlap(OverlapCallback& overlapCallback) {
566  mCollisionDetection.testOverlap(overlapCallback);
567 }
568 
569 // Return a reference to the memory manager of the world
570 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE MemoryManager& PhysicsWorld::getMemoryManager() {
571  return mMemoryManager;
572 }
573 
574 // Return the name of the world
578 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const std::string& PhysicsWorld::getName() const {
579  return mName;
580 }
581 
582 #ifdef IS_RP3D_PROFILING_ENABLED
583 
584 // Return a pointer to the profiler
588 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Profiler* PhysicsWorld::getProfiler() {
589  return mProfiler;
590 }
591 
592 #endif
593 
594 // Get the number of iterations for the velocity constraint solver
598 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint16 PhysicsWorld::getNbIterationsVelocitySolver() const {
599  return mNbVelocitySolverIterations;
600 }
601 
602 // Get the number of iterations for the position constraint solver
606 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint16 PhysicsWorld::getNbIterationsPositionSolver() const {
607  return mNbPositionSolverIterations;
608 }
609 
610 // Set the position correction technique used for contacts
614 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void PhysicsWorld::setContactsPositionCorrectionTechnique(
615  ContactsPositionCorrectionTechnique technique) {
616  if (technique == ContactsPositionCorrectionTechnique::BAUMGARTE_CONTACTS) {
617  mContactSolverSystem.setIsSplitImpulseActive(false);
618  }
619  else {
620  mContactSolverSystem.setIsSplitImpulseActive(true);
621  }
622 }
623 
624 // Return the gravity vector of the world
628 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 PhysicsWorld::getGravity() const {
629  return mConfig.gravity;
630 }
631 
632 // Return if the gravity is enaled
636 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool PhysicsWorld::isGravityEnabled() const {
637  return mIsGravityEnabled;
638 }
639 
640 // Return true if the sleeping technique is enabled
644 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool PhysicsWorld::isSleepingEnabled() const {
645  return mIsSleepingEnabled;
646 }
647 
648 // Return the current sleep linear velocity
652 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal PhysicsWorld::getSleepLinearVelocity() const {
653  return mSleepLinearVelocity;
654 }
655 
656 // Return the current sleep angular velocity
660 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal PhysicsWorld::getSleepAngularVelocity() const {
661  return mSleepAngularVelocity;
662 }
663 
664 // Return the time a body is required to stay still before sleeping
668 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal PhysicsWorld::getTimeBeforeSleep() const {
669  return mTimeBeforeSleep;
670 }
671 
672 // Set an event listener object to receive events callbacks.
674 
678 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void PhysicsWorld::setEventListener(EventListener* eventListener) {
679  mEventListener = eventListener;
680 }
681 
682 // Return the number of CollisionBody in the physics world
684 
687 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 PhysicsWorld::getNbCollisionBodies() const {
688  return static_cast<uint32>(mCollisionBodies.size());
689 }
690 
691 // Return the number of RigidBody in the physics world
695 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 PhysicsWorld::getNbRigidBodies() const {
696  return static_cast<uint32>(mRigidBodies.size());
697 }
698 
699 // Return true if the debug rendering is enabled
703 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool PhysicsWorld::getIsDebugRenderingEnabled() const {
704  return mIsDebugRenderingEnabled;
705 }
706 
707 // Set to true if debug rendering is enabled
711 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void PhysicsWorld::setIsDebugRenderingEnabled(bool isEnabled) {
712  mIsDebugRenderingEnabled = isEnabled;
713 }
714 
715 // Return a reference to the Debug Renderer of the world
719 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE DebugRenderer& PhysicsWorld::getDebugRenderer() {
720  return mDebugRenderer;
721 }
722 
723 }
